item.title: Chrome
item.author: zlog
item.description: chrome has been blocked by CORS policy process 浏览器报错跨域问题 问题一 has been blocked by CORS policy: The request client is not a secure context and the resource is in more-private address space private 查了下官网:https://wicg.github.i

item.title: 0x01.随机数的库
item.author: zlog
item.description:
这篇文章主要介绍使用golang的随机函数库包括以下两种

  • math/rand 伪随机
  • crypto/rand

item.title: 如何使用Markdown写文档
